[Inf Fatal Blows P1]
580F0000 0A8EC990
780F0000 000003DC
640F0000 00000000 00000001
move.q #$000A8EC990, r15
add.q $000003DC, r15
move.l $0000000000000001, (r15)

[Unlock Collection + Shao Kahn + Frost (On)]
04000000 0260CAF0 320003E0
04000000 0260CAF4 D65F03C0
move.l $320003E0, #$00260CAF0(r0)
move.l $D65F03C0, #$00260CAF4(r0)

78001000 000005C0
62000000 00000000 000000F0
move.q #$0009D461E8, r0

move.w $00000000000000F0, (r0)

04000000 01A9C564 1E27D000

[CPU instant Kill]
580F0000 09d5bb98

640F0000 00000000 00000000
